cmput301w14t13.project.controllers.submissions
Class SubmissionController

java.lang.Object
  cmput301w14t13.project.controllers.submissions.SubmissionController
Direct Known Subclasses:
CommentSubmissionController, TopicSubmissionController
public abstract class SubmissionController
extends java.lang.Object

abstract Class used for Creating and editting our Topics and Comments, sets up the view necessary for the user to input the information required, then checks the user submitted information for validity and then submits the new information in a method appropriate with what the user is doing (e.g. Creating or editing)

Author:
nsd

Method Summary
 void attachImage(View view)
          Starts ImageAttachmentController to handle the attaching of a image to the Topic or comment The AttachmentController opens a gallery for the user to select from their library of photos then handles everything necessary to convert the image into a valid bitmap before attaching the image to the Topic or Comment
 CommentTreeElementSubmission getSubmission()
           
 void initialize()
          Constructs the CommentTreeElementSubmission with either a existing CommentTreeElement when editting or a new CommentTreeElement when Creating a Comment or Topic Then initializes the Fields for user input when Creating or editing Topics or Comments then constructs the layout for the user to see finally sets up an initial location
 void openMap(View view)
          Used for User input of location, if online a map is given for the user to place a marker at his desired location, if offline a dialog fragment pops up for manual input of location
 void submit(View v)
          Responsible for creating comments and editing viewables Submits the submission.

Method Detail

initialize

public void initialize()
Constructs the CommentTreeElementSubmission with either a existing CommentTreeElement when editting or a new CommentTreeElement when Creating a Comment or Topic Then initializes the Fields for user input when Creating or editing Topics or Comments then constructs the layout for the user to see finally sets up an initial location

submit

public void submit(View v)
            throws java.lang.InterruptedException
Responsible for creating comments and editing viewables Submits the submission. When the user hits the submit button, it first extracts the information that the user entered in the text fields and constructs a topic or comment from what was entered. Next, it uses CheckSubmission to verify that the submission is valid. Afterwards it can then add the submission to the model based on the submit code. Finally, it updates the model's commentList so that it will display upon return the TopicViewActivity.

Parameters:
v - is the submit button view
Throws:
java.lang.InterruptedException

getSubmission

public CommentTreeElementSubmission getSubmission()

attachImage

public void attachImage(View view)
Starts ImageAttachmentController to handle the attaching of a image to the Topic or comment The AttachmentController opens a gallery for the user to select from their library of photos then handles everything necessary to convert the image into a valid bitmap before attaching the image to the Topic or Comment

openMap

public void openMap(View view)
Used for User input of location, if online a map is given for the user to place a marker at his desired location, if offline a dialog fragment pops up for manual input of location

Parameters:
view -
